arm.name: arm
arm.transformationDescription:
Within a matter of moments, a layer of [npc.armFullDescription] has quickly emerged over them, and, looking down, [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] new plates growing over the fronts and backs of [npc.her] hands. The plates stop their advance at [npc.her] upper-biceps, [npc.her] chitin abruptly transitioning into the [npc.skin] that's covering the rest of [npc.her] body.
As the transformation comes to an end, [npc.nameIsFull] left with anthropomorphic, [style.boldTfGeneric(dragonfly-like arms and hands)], which are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.armFullDescription].
arm.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] [npc.armRows] arms, which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.armFullDescription(true)]. [npc.Her] claw-like hands are formed into anthropomorphic, dragonfly-like hands, complete with dextrous grasping talons.
